alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Hyde; Jones; Martin; Pamlico; Pitt; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 2:31PM EST until January 04 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Washington County in eastern North Carolina... Central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... East central Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 315 PM EST. * At 231 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Black Jack to near Cox Crossroads to Catfish Lake, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, New Bern, Havelock, Washington, Plymouth, River Road, James City, Trent Woods, Belhaven, Swindell Fork, Sladesville, Ransomville, Ponzer, Scranton, Pinetown, Fairfield, Pungo, New Holland, Blounts Creek and Pamlico Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Craven; Hyde; Jones; Martin; Pamlico; Pitt; Washington
